code: @Override public boolean matches(T value) {     if (this.matcher.matches(value)) {         return true.     }     StringDescription description = new StringDescription().     this.matcher.describeTo(description).     describedAs(description.toString()).     return false. }
public static <T> Condition<T> when(Matcher<? extends T> matcher) {     return by(matcher). }
public static <T> Condition<T> by(Matcher<? extends T> matcher) {     return new Matched<>(matcher). }
